greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if A051027(n) = Product_{p^e|n} A051027(p^e), and 0 otherwise. Here each p^e is the maximal prime power divisor of n, and A051027(n) = sigma(sigma(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
xref: Characteristic function of A336547 (gives positions of ones). Cf also A336548 (positions of zeros).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 25 2020
